entry.title: https://github.com/IntersectMBO/cardano-db-sync
entry.content: A component that follows the Cardano chain and stores blocks and transactions in PostgreSQL

entry.title: https://github.com/IntersectMBO/ouroboros-network
entry.content: Specifications of network protocols and implementations of components running these protocols which support a family of Ouroboros Consesus protocols; the diffusion layer of the Cardano Node.

entry.title: https://github.com/NixOS/nixfmt
entry.content: The official (but not yet stable) formatter for Nix code

entry.title: https://github.com/PostgREST/postgrest
entry.content: REST API for any Postgres database

entry.title: https://github.com/fossas/fossa-cli
entry.content: Fast, portable and reliable dependency analysis for any codebase. Supports license & vulnerability scanning for large monoliths. Language-agnostic; integrates with 20+ build systems.

entry.title: https://github.com/ghc/ghc
entry.content: Mirror of the Glasgow Haskell Compiler. Please submit issues and patches to GHC's Gitlab instance (https://gitlab.haskell.org/ghc/ghc). First time contributors are encouraged to get started with the newcomers info (https://gitlab.haskell.org/ghc/ghc/wikis/contributing).

entry.title: https://github.com/haskell/cabal
entry.content: Official upstream development repository for Cabal and cabal-install

entry.title: https://github.com/haskell/haskell-language-server
entry.content: Official haskell ide support via language server (LSP). Successor of ghcide & haskell-ide-engine.

entry.title: https://github.com/koalaman/shellcheck
entry.content: ShellCheck, a static analysis tool for shell scripts

entry.title: https://github.com/simonmichael/hledger
entry.content: Robust, fast, intuitive plain text accounting tool with CLI, TUI and web interfaces.

entry.title: https://github.com/xmonad/xmonad
entry.content: The core of xmonad, a small but functional ICCCM-compliant tiling window manager
